channel.title: Auto updating players? HELP PLEASE!
channel.description:
Well, I made it so when you click a door and you enter a password and click the door again (the password is in the rules forcing people to read them to play the game) it teles you to the other side. When you tele to the other side it dose not show it to everyone else. So after you walk it looks like you are walking through walls, the door, water, etc. Dose anyone have any ideas?
Yes i added the updaterequired thing in the useobject thing. I also have it like 4 times in boolean process... It dose not work! Any suggestions?

item.title: Auto updating players? HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

No that is a totally dumb explination. The coords are RIGHT NEXT TO THE DOOR and the hight is THE SAME AS THE DOOR.

Its right next to the door and same hight as everyone else. See what happens is whenthe person goes to the other side of the door no one can tell because to everyone else the person DOSE NOT MOVE! I need it to refresh all the other players.

Ok now I’m getting pissed… 71 views no replies… Are you fucking lazy or is it not possible. TELL ME IF IT’S NOT POSSIBLE!

Read full topic

item.title: Auto updating players? HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

its because the coordinates heights are different…they have to tele to varrock or something to make screen work again…

Read full topic
